ai-atk-abh03a13:2_1: Then right now that it belongs to the aggregates.’
ai-atk-abh03a13:2_2: There I desire to be reborn in the past, future, and present. There I questions of the past, future, and present.
ai-atk-abh03a13:2_3: Furthermore, I’ll ask you about the past, the future, or present, and it causes it to turn back inside.
ai-atk-abh03a13:2_4: take leave of the sense fields and lands in the future, and they falter and founders. Or they stay firm, and fails to know the dagger. But this is the case.
ai-atk-abh03a13:4_1: But you won’t associate with the Sakyans, and you ask about the proper conduct.
ai-atk-abh03a13:4_2: And there is no such thing as them.
ai-atk-abh03a13:4_3: When there is no longer impermanence, there is no-one else.
ai-atk-abh03a13:4_4: the second time of others, the Sakyans of the deceiver, and the use of Others.
ai-atk-abh03a13:4_5: And what the work of the aggregates is developed and cultivated there’s no sound of clearing throats or any noise.
ai-atk-abh03a13:5_0: In the past, future, and present.
